Family Charadriidae (plovers)

Species: 4

*Ranges reflect breeding grounds only.*

**Killdeer(*Charadrius vociferus*)**, Range: Americas from Equatorial Region North

**Common Ringed Plover(*Charadrius hiaticula*)**, Range: High Boreal Palearctic and Greenland Tundra

**Semipalmated Plover(*Charadrius semipalmatus*)**, Range: High Boreal Nearctic Tundra Excepting Greenland

**Piping Plover(*Charadrius melodus*)**, Range: High Temperate Nearctic Sandflats and Beaches
